text:
The usecase framework view pipeline is currently built to support views that
take up the whole screen. We need to figure out a clean way to embed a usecase
view in a page. The site tab usecases are a good example.

i enhanced the usecase.js code to treat tab.* usecases seperately. if necessary,
more views can be arbitrated in that place.
